title: Fullscreen mode = no more windows notifications
content: When I start Firefox and view a website in full-screen mode, Firefox is always in the foreground and also blocks all notifications from the Windows Notification Center. How can I stop this? I have already checked the settings. Nothing is activated here. I would like to view a website in full-screen mode, but still receive notifications. As soon as I exit full-screen mode, the Windows notifications are displayed again. Thank you for your help!

title: Images can not be dragged and dropped anymore
content:
Since a few weeks, I can not drag image from and hence not drop images out of firefox anymore. I used to be able to drag and drop any image from any website into any other app before. Now, I have to right-click and save the image to the file system and from there in a second step decide what to do with it. This is very inconvenient and annoying.

Is this a bug? Is there a new setting where I have to enable this functionality again? Or is it simply a regression of firefox?

title: impostazioni generali: mancata apertura finestre e schede esistenti all'avvio di Firefox
content: Buongiorno utilizzo Firefox su un PC Desktop con Windows 11 PRO (versione 24H2 - Sistema operativo a 64 bit, processore basato su x64) e da diverso tempo ogni volta che avvio il vostro Broswer non mi apre automaticamente le finestre e le schede esistenti nonostante nelle impostazioni generali abbia flaggato all'avvio apri finestre e schede esistenti. Tempo fa questo non accadeva e mi domando come si possa risolvere il problema, sottolineo che invece con il broswer Chrome questo non avviene e funziona regolarmente aprendo all'avvio tutte le finestre e schede esistenti che ho utilizzato nell'ultima sessione di utilizzo di questo broswer. Potete aiutarmi a risolvere il problema e/o fornirmi indicazioni in merito su questo malfunzionamento di Firefox? Vi ringrazio anticipatamente - buona giornata! Saluti - Giuliano Frau

title: Assistance Required for Firefox Profile Creation Error Despite Reinstall and Profile Reset Attempts
content:
Dear Firefox Support Team,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to seek assistance regarding an issue we have been facing with Firefox. After some days of usage, Firefox prompts us to create a new profile, and the browser does not function as expected unless we do so.

Here are the details:

We have installed the latest version of Firefox several times (2-3 times). We have also created new profiles, but the issue persists. Despite these efforts, the error to create a new profile continues to reoccur. Could you kindly assist us in resolving this issue? Any guidance or troubleshooting steps would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your support. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
